pullRequest.title: Release Excel File in Table View
pullRequest.bodyText:
FIleOutputStream is closed after the file has been written to.

Description of the Change
Closed the file output stream after the excel file is written to.

Alternate Designs
N/A

Why Should This Be In Core?
Bugfix

Benefits
Files are no longer read-only when constellation is open.

Possible Drawbacks
N/A

Verification Process
Exported multiple files and edited them while constellation was still running.

Applicable Issues
#860

commit.message:
Excel files now released after writing

FIleOutputStream is closed after the file has been written to.
